main event: Witnesses reported seeing a silvery disc hovering in the air over Lihue, Kauai, on January 15, 1951.
interesting points: The sighting involved responsible county officials,The object was described as a silvery disc with considerable hovering time,Multiple reports suggest an unexplained appearance of the object in the clear sky,The sighting occurred at approximately 6:30 p.m.,This was the third reported instance of flying discs over Kauai.
